summary: Completed comprehensive testing of redesigned Wyniki (Results) page with new Excel-like interface. All 15 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI flows verified working. The previous usability issue (missing add buttons) has been RESOLVED - each day row now has visible '+' buttons for adding income and costs.
passed_tests: All 28 days of February 2026 displayed correctly
Green '+' button visible for adding income on each day
Red '+' button visible for adding costs on each day
'Szczegoly' button visible and accessible on each day
Dialog 'Dodaj przychod' opens correctly with date/shop/amount/description fields
Dialog 'Dodaj koszt' opens with category dropdown (TikTok, Meta, Google, Zwroty)
Category dropdown shows all 4 cost types with distinct colors
Dialog 'Szczegoly' shows income/cost entries with trash icons for deletion
Delete functionality works - entries removed and KPIs updated
KPI cards (Przychod, Koszty, Zysk, Na leb) update in real-time after changes
Shop tabs (Wszystkie, ecom1, ecom2, ecom3, ecom4) switch views correctly
Mobile view (390x844) shows all buttons accessible and dialogs work
Toast notifications 'Dodano!' and 'Usunieto' appear correctly
Month navigation (< Luty 2026 >) works
API: POST /api/incomes creates income entry
API: GET /api/incomes filters by date and shop_id
API: DELETE /api/incomes removes income
API: POST /api/costs creates TikTok/Meta/Google/Zwroty costs
API: GET /api/costs filters by category
API: DELETE /api/costs removes cost
API: GET /api/monthly-stats returns 28 days with correct structure
API: GET /api/combined-monthly-stats returns aggregated data for all shops
API: Login returns shops list for tab display
seed_data_creation: Test data created during E2E testing: income (999 zł) and cost (150 zł Meta) on day 10. Income was deleted during delete test. Cost may still exist.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Wyniki page redesigned with Excel-like interface. Key features verified: 1) Each day row has 4 columns: Dzień, Przychód (with green + button), Koszty (with red + button), Akcje (Szczegoly button). 2) Dialogs for add income/cost work with proper validation. 3) Szczegoly dialog shows all entries with delete icons and quick-add category buttons. 4) Cost categories: TikTok, Meta, Google, Zwroty with custom columns support. 5) KPI cards auto-update. 6) Shop tabs filter view. 7) Mobile responsive.

features: Quick-add buttons: + TikTok, + Meta, + Google, + Zwroty

user_reported_issue_status.original_issue: Poprzednia wersja była nieużywalna - nie było przycisku do dodawania danych
user_reported_issue_status.resolution: RESOLVED - New Excel-like interface with visible '+' buttons on every day row for income and costs
